thread.section_title: Gift Card Granny Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gift Card Granny | www.giftcardgranny.com | 4 of 12
thread.title: Cleo
thread.title_full: Gift Card Granny reviewed by Cleo

author: Cleo
title: Cleo
text: I have been buying gift cards from Gift Card Granny for over a year, and the cards have always worked. However, there are some limitations on what the gift cards can be used to purchase. Walgreen's, for example, will not accept gift cards in the pharmacy. I think a gift card should be accepted as cash. There should not be limitations on what items can be purchased with a gift card.
